data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Ranchi.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ranchi, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Ranchi, Jharkhand, India that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Ranchi, Jharkhand, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Ranchi, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 2,846,883, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Kisan people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kisan people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kisan people is yours.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Ranchi who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Ranchi.

data.section_summary:
the county of Ranchi, Jharkhand, India has a population of 2,914,300.

We estimate Ranchi has 32,057 people who might know Jesus, 35,360 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,846,883 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ranchi, Jharkhand, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
